title: Product Card Slider Widget
description: A slider/carousel of product cards with configurable display options

products.description: Array of product objects to display in the slider

enableQuantityIndicator.description: Whether to enable quantity selection for products

showEmptyState.description: Whether to show an empty state when no products are available

emptyState.description: Configuration for the empty state display

title.description: Title text for the empty state

subtitle.description: Subtitle text for the empty state

image.description: URL for the empty state image

shouldOpenMiniPdp.description: Whether clicking a product should open a mini product page modal

miniPdpCta.description: Call-to-action configuration for the mini product page

actions.description: Actions to perform when the mini PDP CTA is clicked

isCartUpdating.description: Whether the cart is currently being updated

itemBeingAddedToCart.description: SKU of the item currently being added to cart

cartItems.description: Current items in the cart with quantities

qty.description: Quantity of the item in cart

handleCardClick.description: Function handler for product card click events that takes a product object as argument

handleCtaClick.description: Function handler for product CTA button click events that takes a product object as argument

handleUpdateCartItem.description: Function handler for updating cart items that takes a product object as argument

sliderConfig.description: Configuration for the slider behavior and appearance

aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio for the slider items

slidesToShow.description: Number of slides to show at once on mobile

slidesToShowDesktop.description: Number of slides to show at once on desktop

showPeek.description: Whether to show a peek of the next slide

peekVariant.description: Size of the peek for the next slide

infinite.description: Whether the carousel should loop infinitely

arrowPosition.description: Position of the navigation arrows relative to the carousel content
